item.title: Dollar Bears Seize on Notion of Crumbling US Exceptionalism
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trumpâ€™s tariff threats once again lifted the dollar last week, but a growing group of investors is betting against the greenback amid signs the US economy is cooling and on concern a trade war will weaken it further. The expanding chorus of greenback bears includes as...
